subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Army (6-4) and Notre Dame (5-5) will resume their historic football rivalry at the new Yankee Stadium, the first game in the Bronx between the teams since 1969.
snippet: Army (6-4) and Notre Dame (5-5) will resume their historic football rivalry at the new Yankee Stadium, the first game in the Bronx between the teams since 1969.
